variables.input:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event")
| dedup releaseName
| fields releaseName

fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event")
| dedup stageName
| filterOut isNull(stageName)
| fields stageName

fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"build.complete")
| dedup buildNumber
| fields buildNumber

0.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"build.complete")
| filter result == "succeeded"
| summarize count(), by: {result}

1.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"build.complete")
| filter result == "failed"
| summarize count(), by: {result}

2.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"build.complete")
| filter result == "canceled"
| summarize count(), by: {result}

3.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"build.complete")
| filter result == "partiallySucceeded"
| summarize count(), by: {result}

4.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"build.complete")
| filter result == "succeeded"
| summarize `Build Count`=count(), by: {buildNumber}
| filter in(buildNumber, array($BuildNumber))
| fieldsRename `Build Number`=buildNumber
| sort `Build Count` desc

5.title: Build Reason
5.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"build.complete")
| filter result == "succeeded"
| summarize count=count(), by: resource.reason
| sort count desc

6.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"build.complete")
| filter result == "failed"
| summarize `Build Count`=count(), by: buildNumber
| filter in(buildNumber, array($BuildNumber))
| fieldsRename `Build Number`=buildNumber
| sort `Build Count` desc

9.title: Build Reason
9.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"build.complete")
| filter result == "failed"
| summarize count=count(), by: resource.reason
| sort count desc

12.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"build.complete")
| filter result == "partiallySucceeded"
| summarize `Build Count`=count(), by: buildNumber
| filter in(buildNumber, array($BuildNumber))
| fieldsRename `Build Number`=buildNumber
| sort `Build Count` desc

13.title: Build Reason
13.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"build.complete")
| filter result == "partiallySucceeded"
| summarize count=count(), by: resource.reason
| sort count desc

14.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"build.complete")
| filter result == "canceled"
| summarize `Build Count`=count(), by: buildNumber
| filter in(buildNumber, array($BuildNumber))
| fieldsRename `Build Number`=buildNumber
| sort `Build Count` desc

15.title: Build Reason
15.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"build.complete")
| filter result == "canceled"
| summarize count=count(), by: resource.reason
| sort count desc

17.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event")
| summarize count(), by: {releaseStatus}

19.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event")
| summarize `Release Count`=count(), by: {releaseName}
| filter in(releaseName, array($ReleaseName))
| fieldsRename `Release Name`= releaseName
| sort `Release Count` desc

20.title: Release Stage
20.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event")
| filter releaseStatus == "succeeded"
| summarize count=count(), by:{stageName}
| filter in(stageName,array($ReleaseStage))
| sort count desc

22.title: Release Project
22.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event")
| filter releaseStatus == "succeeded"
| summarize count(), by:{projectName}

23.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event")
| filter releaseStatus == "rejected"
| summarize count(), by:{releaseStatus}

24.title: Release Stage
24.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event")
| filter releaseStatus == "rejected"
| filter in(stageName,array($ReleaseStage))
| summarize count(), by:{stageName}

25.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event")
| filter releaseStatus == "rejected"
| summarize `Release Count`=count(), by: {releaseName}
| filter in(releaseName, array($ReleaseName))
| fieldsRename `Release Name`=releaseName
| sort `Release Count` desc

26.title: Release Project
26.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event")
| filter releaseStatus == "rejected"
| summarize count(), by:{projectName}

30.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event")
| parse `resource.deployment.startedOn`, "TIMESTAMP('yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSSSS'):DeployStartTime LD"
| parse `resource.deployment.completedOn`, "TIMESTAMP('yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSSSS'):DeployEndTime LD"
| fields DeployDuration=DeployEndTime-DeployStartTime, releaseName
| filterOut isNull(DeployDuration)
| summarize avg(DeployDuration)

32.title: Duration by Release
32.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event")
| parse `resource.deployment.startedOn`, "TIMESTAMP('yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSSSS'):DeployStartTime LD"
| parse `resource.deployment.completedOn`, "TIMESTAMP('yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSSSS'):DeployEndTime LD"
| fields DeployDuration=DeployEndTime-DeployStartTime, releaseName
| filterOut isNull(DeployDuration)
| filter in(releaseName, array($ReleaseName))
| sort DeployDuration desc

33.title: Deployment Frequency by Release & Timestamp
33.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "AzureDevOps" and matchesPhrase(event.type,"ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event")
| filter releaseStatus == "succeeded"
| fields timestamp,releaseStatus,releaseName
| makeTimeseries count(), by:{releaseName},interval:15m
| filter in(releaseName, array($ReleaseName))
